import { BrowserRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Container } from "./styles" import ScrollAnimation from "react-animate-on-scroll" import Illustration from "../../assets/illustration.svg" import { NavHashLink } from "react-router-hash-link" import linkedin from '../../assets/linkedin.svg' import githubIcon from '../../assets/github.svg' import whatsapp from '../../assets/whatsapp.svg' import Hello from '../../assets/Hello.gif' const Hero = () => { return (

Hello , I'm

Ajay Singh Bisht

React Native Developer

5 Years of Experience

 Contact
) } export default Hero
